00032 #define checkGLError() \
00033 {    \
00034     GLenum err = glGetError(); \
00035     if(err != GL_NO_ERROR) { \
00036         switch(err) \
00037         { \
00038         case GL_INVALID_ENUM: \
00039             dbgPrint("GL_INVALID_ENUM"); \
00040             break; \
00041         case GL_INVALID_VALUE: \
00042             dbgPrint("GL_INVALID_VALUE"); \
00043             break; \
00044         case GL_INVALID_OPERATION: \
00045             dbgPrint("GL_INVALID_OPERATION"); \
00046             break; \
00047         case GL_STACK_OVERFLOW: \
00048             dbgPrint("GL_STACK_OVERFLOW"); \
00049             break; \
00050         case GL_STACK_UNDERFLOW: \
00051             dbgPrint("GL_STACK_UNDERFLOW"); \
00052             break; \
00053         case GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY: \
00054             dbgPrint("GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY"); \
00055             break; \
00056         } \
00057     } \
00058 }

00061 #define FONT_FILE "mikachan/mikachan.ttf"
00062     
00063 #define DEFAULT_FONT_SIZE 12

00065 #undef USE_ICONV_SRC_UTF8
00066 #define USE_ICONV_SRC_UCS2

00068 #undef USE_ICONV_WCHART // this is portable, however, it likely depends on the current locale.
00069 #if defined MACOSX
00070 #define USE_ICONV_UCS4_AS_WCHART
00071 //    #define USE_ICONV_WCHART
00072 #endif
00073 #if defined __linux__
00074 //    #define USE_ICONV_WCHART
00075 #define USE_ICONV_UCS4_AS_WCHART
00076 #endif
00077 #if defined WINDOWS
00078 #define USE_ICONV_UCS2_AS_WCHART

00081 static iconv_t s_iconv_cd = (iconv_t)-1;
00082 
00083 int XQGraphPainter::s_fontRefCount = 0;
00084 FTFont *XQGraphPainter::s_pFont = NULL;
00085 
00086 void
00087 XQGraphPainter::openFont()
00088 {
00089     if(s_fontRefCount == 0) {
00090         QString filename = ::locate("appdata", FONT_FILE);
00091         if(!filename)
00092         {
00093             gErrPrint(KAME::i18n("No Fontfile!!"));
00094         }
00095         s_pFont = new FTGLPixmapFont(filename.ascii() );
00096         ASSERT(s_pFont->Error() == 0);
00097         s_pFont->CharMap(ft_encoding_unicode);
00098         
00099         setlocale(LC_CTYPE, KApplication::kApplication()->config()->locale().latin1());
00100     #ifdef USE_ICONV_SRC_UTF8
00101     #define ICONV_SRC "UTF-8"
00102     #endif
00103     #ifdef USE_ICONV_SRC_UCS2
00104     #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00105     #define ICONV_SRC "UCS-2BE"
00106     #else
00107     #define ICONV_SRC "UCS-2LE"
00108     #endif
00109     #endif
00110     #ifndef ICONV_SRC
00111     #error
00112     #endif
00113     #ifdef USE_ICONV_WCHART
00114     #define ICONV_DST "WCHAR_T"
00115     #endif
00116     #ifdef USE_ICONV_UCS4_AS_WCHART
00117         C_ASSERT(sizeof(wchar_t) == 4);
00118     #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00119     #define ICONV_DST "UCS-4BE"
00120     #else
00121     #define ICONV_DST "UCS-4LE"
00122     #endif
00123     #endif
00124     #ifdef USE_ICONV_UCS2_AS_WCHART
00125         C_ASSERT(sizeof(wchar_t) == 2);
00126     #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00127     #define ICONV_DST "UCS-2BE"
00128     #else
00129     #define ICONV_DST "UCS-2LE"
00130     #endif
00131     #endif
00132     #ifndef ICONV_DST
00133     #error
00134     #endif
00135         s_iconv_cd = iconv_open(ICONV_DST, ICONV_SRC);
00136         ASSERT(s_iconv_cd != (iconv_t)(-1));
00137         /*
00138           int arg = 1;
00139           if(iconvctl(s_iconv_cd, ICONV_SET_TRANSLITERATE, &arg)) {
00140           XKameError::print(KAME::i18n("iconv error"), __FILE__, __LINE__, errno);
00141           }
00142           int arg = 1;
00143           if(iconvctl(s_utf8toWCHART, ICONV_SET_DISCARD_ILSEQ, &arg)) {
00144           XKameError::print(KAME::i18n("iconv error"), __FILE__, __LINE__, errno);
00145           }
00146         */
00147     }
00148     s_fontRefCount++;
00149 }
00150 
00151 void
00152 XQGraphPainter::closeFont()
00153 {
00154     s_fontRefCount--;
00155     if(s_fontRefCount == 0) {
00156         delete s_pFont;
00157         s_pFont = NULL;
00158         iconv_close(s_iconv_cd);
00159     }
00160 }
00161 XQGraphPainter::~XQGraphPainter()
00162 {
00163     m_pItem->makeCurrent();
00164     
00165     if(m_listplanes) glDeleteLists(m_listplanes, 1);
00166     if(m_listgrids) glDeleteLists(m_listgrids, 1);
00167     if(m_listaxes) glDeleteLists(m_listaxes, 1);
00168     if(m_listpoints) glDeleteLists(m_listpoints, 1);
00169     closeFont();
00170 }
00171 std::wstring
00172 XQGraphPainter::string2wstring(const std::string &str)
00173 {
00174     wchar_t buf[256];
00175     int outsize = sizeof(buf);
00176     char *outp = (char*)buf;
00177     errno = 0;
00178 #ifdef USE_ICONV_SRC_UTF8
00179     const char *inbuf = str.c_str();
00180     int insize = strlen(inbuf);
00181 #endif //USE_ICONV_SRC_UTF8
00182 #ifdef USE_ICONV_SRC_UCS2
00183     QString qstr(str);
00184     const char *inbuf = reinterpret_cast<const char*>(qstr.ucs2());
00185     int insize = qstr.length() * sizeof(unsigned short);
00186 #endif //USE_ICONV_SRC_UCS2
00187     size_t ret = iconv(s_iconv_cd,
00188                        const_cast<char**>(&inbuf), (size_t*)&insize,
00189                        &outp, (size_t*)&outsize);
00190     if(ret == (size_t)(-1)) {
00191         XKameError::print(
00192             KAME::i18n("iconv error, probably locale is not correct."),
00193             __FILE__, __LINE__, errno);
00194         iconv(s_iconv_cd, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL); //reset 
00195         return std::wstring(L"iconv-err"); 
00196     }
00197     ASSERT(outp <= (char*)&buf[sizeof(buf)/sizeof(wchar_t) - 1]);
00198     *((wchar_t *)outp) = L'\0';
00199     return std::wstring(buf); 
00200 }
00201 
00202 int
00203 XQGraphPainter::windowToScreen(int x, int y, double z, XGraph::ScrPoint *scr)
00204 {
00205     GLdouble nx, ny, nz;
00206     int ret = gluUnProject((double)x, (double)m_viewport[3] - y, z, m_model, m_proj, m_viewport, &nx, &ny, &nz);
00207     scr->x = nx;
00208     scr->y = ny;
00209     scr->z = nz;
00210     return (ret != GL_TRUE);
00211 }
00212 int
00213 XQGraphPainter::screenToWindow(const XGraph::ScrPoint &scr, double *x, double *y, double *z)
00214 {
00215     GLdouble nx, ny, nz;
00216     int ret = gluProject(scr.x, scr.y, scr.z, m_model, m_proj, m_viewport, &nx, &ny, &nz);
00217     *x = nx;
00218     *y = m_viewport[3] - ny;
00219     *z = nz;
00220     return (ret != GL_TRUE);
00221 }

00225 {
00226     if((x1 != x2) || (y1 != y2)) {
00227         m_pItem->updateGL();
00228     }
00229 }

00276 void
00277 XQGraphPainter::defaultFont()
00278 {
00279     m_curAlign = 0;
00280     m_curFontSize = DEFAULT_FONT_SIZE;
00281 }
00282 int
00283 XQGraphPainter::selectFont(const std::string &str, const XGraph::ScrPoint &start, const XGraph::ScrPoint &dir, const XGraph::ScrPoint &swidth, int sizehint)
00284 {
00285     XGraph::ScrPoint d = dir;
00286     d.normalize();
00287     XGraph::ScrPoint s1 = start;
00288     double x, y, z;
00289     if(screenToWindow(s1, &x, &y, &z)) return -1;
00290     XGraph::ScrPoint s2 = s1;
00291     d *= 0.001;
00292     s2 += d;
00293     double x1, y1, z1;
00294     if(screenToWindow(s2, &x1, &y1, &z1)) return -1;
00295     XGraph::ScrPoint s3 = s1;
00296     XGraph::ScrPoint wo2 = swidth;
00297     wo2 *= 0.5;
00298     s3 += wo2;
00299     double x2, y2, z2;
00300     if(screenToWindow(s3, &x2, &y2, &z2)) return -1;    
00301     XGraph::ScrPoint s4 = s1;
00302     s4 -= wo2;
00303     double x3, y3, z3;
00304     if(screenToWindow(s4, &x3, &y3, &z3)) return -1;    
00305     int align = 0;
00306 // width and height, restrict text
00307     double w = fabs(x3 - x2), h = fabs(y3 - y2);    
00308     if( fabs(x - x1) > fabs( y - y1) ) {
00309         //dir is horizontal
00310         align |= AlignVCenter;
00311         h = min(h, 2 * min(y, m_pItem->height() - y));
00312         if( x > x1 ) {
00313             align |= AlignRight;
00314             w = x;
00315         }
00316         else {
00317             align |= AlignLeft;
00318             w = m_pItem->width() - x;
00319         }
00320     }
00321     else {
00322         //dir is vertical
00323         align |= AlignHCenter;
00324         w = min(w, 2 * min(x, m_pItem->width() - x));
00325         if( y < y1 ) {
00326             align |= AlignTop;
00327             h = m_pItem->height() - y;
00328         }
00329         else {
00330             align |= AlignBottom;
00331             h = y;
00332         }
00333     }
00334     float llx, lly, llz, urx, ury, urz;
00335     std::wstring wstr = string2wstring(str);
00336     m_curFontSize = DEFAULT_FONT_SIZE + sizehint;
00337     m_curAlign = align;
00338     
00339     for(;;) {
00340         s_pFont->FaceSize(m_curFontSize);
00341         s_pFont->BBox(wstr.c_str(), llx, lly, llz, urx, ury, urz);
00342         if(m_curFontSize < DEFAULT_FONT_SIZE + sizehint - 4) return -1;
00343         if((urx < w ) && (ury < h)) break;
00344         m_curFontSize--;
00345     }
00346     checkGLError();
00347     
00348     return 0;
00349 }void
00350 XQGraphPainter::drawText(const XGraph::ScrPoint &p, const std::string &str)
00351 {
00352     float llx, lly, llz, urx, ury, urz;
00353     std::wstring wstr = string2wstring(str);
00354 
00355     glRasterPos3f(p.x, p.y, p.z);
00356     checkGLError();
00357 
00358     s_pFont->FaceSize(m_curFontSize);
00359     s_pFont->BBox(wstr.c_str(), llx, lly, llz, urx, ury, urz);
00360     int w = lrintf(urx);
00361     int h = lrintf(ury);
00362     
00363     float x = 0.0f, y = 0.0f;
00364     if( (m_curAlign & AlignVCenter) ) y -= h / 2;
00365     if( (m_curAlign & AlignTop) ) y -= h;
00366     if( (m_curAlign & AlignHCenter) ) x -= w / 2;
00367     if( (m_curAlign & AlignRight) ) x -= w;
00368     // Move raster position
00369     if((x != 0.0f) || (y != 0.0f))
00370         glBitmap( 0, 0, 0.0f, 0.0f, x, y, (const GLubyte*)0);
00371     
00372     s_pFont->Render(wstr.c_str());
00373     checkGLError();
00374     if(s_pFont->Error())
00375         gWarnPrint(KAME::i18n("GL Font Error."));
00376 }

00378 #define VIEW_NEAR -1.5
00379 #define VIEW_FAR 0.5
00380 
00381 
00382 void
00383 XQGraphPainter::setInitView()
00384 {
00385     glLoadIdentity();
00386     glOrtho(0.0,1.0,0.0,1.0,VIEW_NEAR,VIEW_FAR);
00387 }
00388 void
00389 XQGraphPainter::viewRotate(double angle, double x, double y, double z, bool init)
00390 {
00391     m_pItem->makeCurrent();
00392     glGetError(); //reset error
00393     
00394     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00395     if(init) {
00396         glLoadIdentity();
00397         glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, m_proj_rot); 
00398         setInitView();
00399     }
00400     if(angle != 0.0) {
00401         glLoadIdentity();
00402         glTranslated(0.5, 0.5, 0.5);
00403         glRotatef(angle, x, y, z);
00404         glTranslated(-0.5, -0.5, -0.5);
00405         glMultMatrixd(m_proj_rot);
00406         glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, m_proj_rot);
00407         setInitView();
00408         glMultMatrixd(m_proj_rot);
00409     }
00410     checkGLError();
00411     bool ov = m_bTilted;
00412     m_bTilted = !init;
00413     if(ov != m_bTilted) m_bIsRedrawNeeded = true;
00414     
00415     m_bIsAxisRedrawNeeded = true;
00416 //  if(m_viewport[3] != height() ) return; //firsttime
00417     //save projection matrix
00418 }
00419 
00420 
00421 #define MAX_SELECTION 100
00422 
00423 double
00424 XQGraphPainter::selectGL(int x, int y, int dx, int dy, GLint list,
00425                          XGraph::ScrPoint *scr, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdx, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdy )
00426 {
00427     m_pItem->makeCurrent();
00428       
00429     glGetError(); //reset error
00430       
00431     GLuint selections[MAX_SELECTION];
00432     glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, m_proj);
00433     glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, m_model);
00434     glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, m_viewport);
00435     glSelectBuffer(MAX_SELECTION, selections);
00436     glRenderMode(GL_SELECT);
00437     glInitNames();
00438     glPushName((unsigned int)-1);
00439     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00440     glPushMatrix();
00441     //pick up small region
00442     glLoadIdentity();
00443     gluPickMatrix((double)x, (double)m_viewport[3] - y, (double)dx, (double)dy, m_viewport);
00444     glMultMatrixd(m_proj);
00445       
00446     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00447     glLoadName(1);
00448     glCallList(list);
00449       
00450     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00451     glPopMatrix();
00452     int hits = glRenderMode(GL_RENDER);
00453     double zmin = 1.1;
00454     double zmax = -0.1;
00455     GLuint *ptr = selections;
00456     for (int i = 0; i < hits; i++) {
00457         double zmin1 = (double)ptr[1] / (double)0xffffffffu;
00458         double zmax1  = (double)ptr[2] / (double)0xffffffffu;
00459         int n = ptr[0];
00460         ptr += 3;
00461         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00462             int k = *(ptr++);
00463             if(k != -1) {
00464                 zmin = min(zmin1, zmin);
00465                 zmax = max(zmax1, zmax);
00466             }
00467         }
00468     }
00469     if((zmin < 1.0) && (zmax > 0.0) ) {
00470         windowToScreen(x, y, zmin, scr);
00471         windowToScreen(x + 1, y, zmin, dsdx);
00472         windowToScreen(x, y + 1, zmin, dsdy);
00473     }
00474     checkGLError();
00475     return zmin;
00476 }
00477 
00478 double
00479 XQGraphPainter::selectPlane(int x, int y, int dx, int dy,
00480                             XGraph::ScrPoint *scr, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdx, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdy )
00481 {
00482     return selectGL(x, y, dx, dy, m_listplanes, scr, dsdx, dsdy);

00484 double
00485 XQGraphPainter::selectAxis(int x, int y, int dx, int dy,
00486                            XGraph::ScrPoint *scr, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdx, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdy )

00490 double
00491 XQGraphPainter::selectPoint(int x, int y, int dx, int dy,
00492                             XGraph::ScrPoint *scr, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdx, XGraph::ScrPoint *dsdy )
00493 {
00494     return selectGL(x, y, dx, dy, m_listpoints, scr, dsdx, dsdy);

00496 void
00497 XQGraphPainter::initializeGL ()
00498 {
00499 //  m_pItem->makeCurrent();
00500     
00501 //    glClearColor( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 );
00502 //    glClearDepth( 1.0 );
00503     // Set up the rendering context, define display lists etc.:
00504     glHint(GL_POINT_SMOOTH_HINT,GL_FASTEST);
00505     glHint(GL_LINE_SMOOTH_HINT,GL_FASTEST);
00506     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00507     glDisable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
00508     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00509     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00510     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL);
00511     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00512     if(m_listplanes) glDeleteLists(m_listplanes, 1);
00513     if(m_listgrids) glDeleteLists(m_listgrids, 1);
00514     if(m_listaxes) glDeleteLists(m_listaxes, 1);
00515     if(m_listpoints) glDeleteLists(m_listpoints, 1);
00516     m_listplanes = glGenLists(1);
00517     m_listgrids = glGenLists(1);
00518     m_listaxes = glGenLists(1);
00519     m_listpoints = glGenLists(1);
00520     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00521     glLoadIdentity();
00522     //save model view matrix
00523     viewRotate(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, true);
00524 }
00525 void
00526 XQGraphPainter::resizeGL ( int width  , int height )
00527 {
00528 //  m_pItem->makeCurrent();
00529 
00530     // setup viewport, projection etc.:
00531     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00532     glViewport( 0, 0, (GLint)width, (GLint)height ); 
00533     m_bIsRedrawNeeded = true;
00534 //  drawLists();
00535 }
00536 void
00537 XQGraphPainter::paintGL ()
00538 {
00539 //  m_pItem->makeCurrent();
00540     glGetError(); // flush error
00541     
00542     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00543     glViewport( 0, 0, (GLint)m_pItem->width(), (GLint)m_pItem->height() );
00544     glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, m_proj);
00545     glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, m_model);
00546     glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, m_viewport);
00547 
00548     checkGLError(); 
00549 
00550     // Ghost stuff.
00551     XTime time_started = XTime::now();
00552     if(m_bIsRedrawNeeded || m_bIsAxisRedrawNeeded) {
00553         m_modifiedTime = time_started;    
00554         if(m_lastFrame.size())
00555             m_updatedTime = time_started;
00556         else
00557             m_updatedTime = XTime::XTime();
00558     }
00559         
00560     if(m_bIsRedrawNeeded) {
00561         drawOffScreenStart();
00562         
00563         QColor bgc = (QRgb)*m_graph->backGround();
00564         glClearColor( bgc.red() /255.0f, bgc.green() /255.0f, bgc.blue() /255.0f, 1.0 );
00565         
00566         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00567         
00568         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00569         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00570         
00571         checkGLError(); 
00572 
00573         glNewList(m_listplanes, GL_COMPILE);
00574         drawOffScreenPlanes();
00575         glEndList();
00576         
00577         checkGLError(); 
00578 
00579         glNewList(m_listgrids, GL_COMPILE_AND_EXECUTE);
00580         drawOffScreenGrids();
00581         glEndList();
00582         
00583         checkGLError(); 
00584 
00585         glNewList(m_listpoints, GL_COMPILE_AND_EXECUTE);
00586         drawOffScreenPoints();
00587         glEndList();
00588         
00589         checkGLError(); 
00590 
00591 //      glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);       
00592         glNewList(m_listaxes, GL_COMPILE_AND_EXECUTE);
00593         drawOffScreenAxes();
00594         glEndList();
00595         
00596         checkGLError(); 
00597 
00598         m_bIsRedrawNeeded = false;
00599         m_bIsAxisRedrawNeeded = false;
00600     }
00601     else {
00602         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00603         
00604         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00605         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00606         
00607         glCallList(m_listgrids);
00608         glCallList(m_listpoints);
00609 // //       glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00610         if(m_bIsAxisRedrawNeeded) {
00611             glNewList(m_listaxes, GL_COMPILE_AND_EXECUTE);
00612             drawOffScreenAxes();
00613             glEndList();
00614             m_bIsAxisRedrawNeeded = false;
00615         }
00616         else {
00617             glCallList(m_listaxes);
00618         }
00619     }
00620 
00621     drawOnScreenObj();
00622     
00623     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00624     glPushMatrix();
00625     setInitView();
00626     glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, m_proj);
00627     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00628     
00629     double persist = *m_graph->persistence();
00630     if(persist > 0) {
00631     #define OFFSET 0.1
00632         double tau = persist / (-log(OFFSET)) * 0.4;
00633         double scale = exp(-(time_started - m_updatedTime)/tau);
00634         double offset = -OFFSET*(1.0-scale);
00635         bool update = (time_started - m_modifiedTime) < persist; 
00636         GLint accum;
00637         glGetIntegerv(GL_ACCUM_ALPHA_BITS, &accum);
00638         checkGLError();
00639         //! \todo QGLContext might clear accumration buffer.
00640         if(0) {
00641             if(update) {
00642                 glAccum(GL_MULT, scale);
00643                 checkGLError(); 
00644                 glAccum(GL_ACCUM, 1.0 - scale);
00645                 checkGLError(); 
00646                 glAccum(GL_RETURN, 1.0);
00647                 checkGLError(); 
00648             }
00649             else {
00650                 glAccum(GL_LOAD, 1.0);
00651                 checkGLError(); 
00652             }
00653         }
00654         else {
00655             m_lastFrame.resize(m_pItem->width() * m_pItem->height() * 4);
00656             if(update) {
00657                 glPixelTransferf(GL_ALPHA_SCALE, scale);
00658                 checkGLError(); 
00659                 glPixelTransferf(GL_ALPHA_BIAS, offset);
00660                 checkGLError(); 
00661                 glRasterPos2i(0,0);
00662                 checkGLError(); 
00663                 glDrawPixels((GLint)m_pItem->width(), (GLint)m_pItem->height(), 
00664                              GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, &m_lastFrame[0]);
00665                 checkGLError(); 
00666                 glPixelTransferf(GL_ALPHA_SCALE, 1.0);
00667                 checkGLError(); 
00668                 glPixelTransferf(GL_ALPHA_BIAS, 0.0);
00669                 checkGLError(); 
00670             }
00671             glReadPixels(0, 0, (GLint)m_pItem->width(), (GLint)m_pItem->height(),
00672                          GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, &m_lastFrame[0]);
00673             checkGLError();     
00674         }
00675         m_updatedTime = time_started;
00676         if(update) {
00677             QTimer::singleShot(50, m_pItem, SLOT(update()));
00678         }
00679     }
00680     else {
00681         m_lastFrame.clear();
00682         m_updatedTime = XTime::XTime();
00683     }
00684 
00685     drawOnScreenViewObj();
00686     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00687     glPopMatrix();
00688 //    glFlush();
00689 }
